entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 10:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -25.5°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
